title: Question for the Zed mains out there
body:
Do {{champion:238}}'s Living Shadows mimic item passives/actives? What about basic attacks if they are in range?

I want to know because I plan on buying him, and I came up with an interesting idea, assuming item passives/actives/basic attacks get mimic'd:

Ult + Living Shadow + Basic Attack + BoRK active = 126% enemy health (if I'm correct) + 100% of your AD

Please help this newb

replies.body: No. No AAs or item actives.
Also, what about item passives that don't pertain to AAs?
Thanks for telling me :D another question: if you ult, does the shadow that spawns mimic living shadow if you use it during the ult?
No your ult won't throw out a w. That'd be sick as fuck, but ultimately too complicated.

shadows will only mimic abilities the damage they will deal is tied to zed's stats and if a champion is hit with multiple versions of a mimiced ability
the first one will deal damage while the other ones deal reduced damage
No. No AAs or item actives.
